title: How to Cook Biryani Masala Mixed Vegetables

steps.headline: Wash all the vegetables until completely clean.
Keep the pressure cooker on heat and add 2 tbsp of any oil .
When the oil get heated up put ginger and garlic paste along with cumin seeds.
After ten seconds add all the vegetables and add 2 tbsp of Biryani masala and stir well.
Close the cover of the cooker and let 5 whistles go.
When you open the cooker add salt according to taste and garnish with cilantro.

text: Wash all the vegetables until completely clean.  Chop all the vegetables.  Keep the pressure cooker on heat and add 2 tbsp of any oil .  When the oil get heated up put ginger and garlic paste along with cumin seeds.  After ten seconds add all the vegetables and add 2 tbsp of Biryani masala and stir well.  Close the cover of the cooker and let 5 whistles go.  Turn off the heat.  When you open the cooker add salt according to taste and garnish with cilantro.  Finished.
